values:
I used to think that I wrote best when I was mad, but I just realized it's not that..It's that I feel best after writing when I'm mad, versus any other emotion. Do you understand? Because everything is so random--so sudden, and I never know what to do. And it seems everytime I think I have good judgment, I end up adding another mistake to the list. And I hate how I abuse the privelege to hate, because I've never met someone with as much resentment inside of them as I have. And I overuse the phrase "I don't fucking give a shit"--because in all reality, I do. Sometimes I think I care too much, sometimes I give people too much credit, and I'm found corrupted by negativety, because it's your flaws that I hide behind. I'm not saying I'm perfect--I know that I am far from it. Because you know that when it comes to hit or miss, I'll be gone, because I'm too scared to take chances. I'm not afraid of failing, no..I'm used to failure..I just hate not succeeding. I'm not involved in anything because I know I don't have the will to make an effect, and compliments bring me down even more because I'm just that insecure. And I only feel complete when I'm all by myself, because that way, I know no one's judging me..at least not in front of my face. And even when I'm alone, it's a different kind of complete. I find myself peforming certain actions to fill the void--the emptiness, that lingers when it's quiet. And I could only pray that someday I will overcome my need to be independent, because actually, I am the exact opposite. I depend on too many people and too many things--this journal being one. I hate that whenever I have a bad day, I rant and rave in here, because I hate complaining. I hate the fact that most of those rant and raves have been deleted--only read by my eyes, because [as previously mentioned] ..I care too much. I hate that I can go from one emotion to the next in such a short period of time.. I feel fucking pathetic. And this journal entry reflects why.


I guess my mom really hit the nail on the head when she bought me the key chain: "I go from zero to BITCH in 3.5 seconds."

a recap of what's happened since i last updated:


- lost my permit
- called up [bitched at] koehler for forgetting to send my waiver via mail
- the show [was really pretty boring sort-of]
- found the perfect car for ali
- purchased the perfect car for ali
- was threatened to not reciece the perfect car for ali ? LAME POO. LAME. POO.
- met my step bro. he's big.
- met my step bro's girl friend. she's wee.
- had a lovely heart-to-heart conversation with muh gramma
- "you're lucky you have a bitch for a mother"
- my father stated i'm merely an inconvenience
- my doggy turned 42. happy birfday alexander bentley miller III
- burned a mix compilation of neat songs ali fancies. like ali's greatest fancies CD. HAWT.
- met my neighbor's 5 month daughter
- accomplished getting to sleep at 2 in the morning
- accomplished waking up before noon [huge improvement]
- held many grudges/resentments against my father
- developed my first tan line in 2 years

pretty pathetic.

It is what it is, but it's also what you make it, and we made it exactly how Justin would have wanted us to. We shed our tears and said our goodbyes, but the majority of his wake consisted of smiling and laughing, due to reminiscing in rememberence of him. I wish I could say his wake was beautiful, but unfortunately, the cold body lying in the casket wasn't the real Justin, SSB, Buddy Bear, or whatever you may know him as. Reason being: he wasn't smiling. I swear to God I've never seen Justin not smiling, and that's what makes it the hardest..knowing we'll never be able to see that smile in person again. I can't describe the feeling I have inside.. Lately I've been made up of so many mixed emotions. I feel empty, sad, sympathetic--and then I feel hatred. I hate Justin's father and I hate God for doing this and I wish none of this would ever have happened. And I hate that I can't do anything about it, or comfort anyone, or help in any way at all. I feel useless. And I hate it.

Tonight after we left, I suggested we go to Picco's house, since they made him leave the wake. We forgot he didn't live on Columbia anymore, so we didn't get to do that. Instead we went back to Andy's house and reminisced some more. It felt good to talk to people who it seems I haven't talked to in ages. I miss the days when no one worried. I miss warm summer days and cool nights like tonight.  I hate this journal entry.

They say you never know what you truly have, until it's taken away, and maybe that's right. But what's also true is that the worst things can happen to the best people. Justin did not deserve any of this; from his addiction, to cancer, to death. He was always such a strong person, even with cancer he toughed it out. I remember when we found out he had Hotchins, Megan and I brought pizza and breadsticks to his house for him. His mother said he would like that as a tear rolled down her cheek. I'll never forget that night, walking through town, reminiscing with Justin. I'll never forget any other day or night or memory we shared. Everything lately has reminded me of him. Tonight, when I went to Phil's house, we were making faces at each other and I told him I could do a smile that resembled the Grinch. I did it, and right then the time on the bus popped into my head, when I showed Chris and Justin my Grinch smile, and when Justin gave me that devilish, never to be forgotten, ear-to-ear grin. I cried because I knew I would never be able to see that smile in person again. On the way home tonigh, Hotel California by the Eagles came on the radio. My sister turned it up and we sang our hearts out, and halfway through I remembered the time at Alyssa's when Justin was sitting on the floor, playing that song for us on the guitar. I particularly fancied it, since it is my favorite Eagles song. I remember laughing with him as he attempted the solo, and I'd give anything to hear that laugh again, to see that huge grin, to be able to spend time with Justin and not have to worry. Friday night I saw him riding his bike in town, and I thought to myself how lucky he was to have caught the cancer so early, and be able to stop it from spreading. Little did I know, the next day he would be gone. I wish I could have stopped to say my last goodbye; or rather, to say Hello...Hello to a new life he will be able to live up in Heaven, free of pain and bad habbits. I speak on part of everyone who knew Justin--everyone who's heart Justin has touched--when I say he truly was a remarkable person. He definately will never be forgotten.
RIP Justin William Eklund May 24, 1988 - May 22, 2004 Happy Birthday Babe
BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE.
<marquee><font color=black>'cuz im the only one who sees you in the darkness of the night</marquee>

today i told him i'm addicted to porn. we're in love. it's hawt.

it's about time i update, because mother nature has decided to run her NASTY course on me today. i am currently undergoing the harsh conditions in which the menstrual cycle has to offer, consisting of achy knees, back, and underarms; throbbing ovaries, crampings of the tummy and urinary triangle, and regurgitation of the sorts. power to the women.

and of course, i must mention how amazingly well the Eagles concert turned out. because it RAWKED. and with the help of my abilities to ignore dumb ho's, the [evil] stepmom didn't get on my nerves too terribly bad. plus they closed with Desperado, equalling an approximate 6.5 boners for ali.

with this being said, my birthday was quite thee success. i recieved many homemade cards that made me smile, the new fall out boy cd from cor dawg, bubba from jake, sweat pea bubble bath, $$$, and some more oodles. a special thanks to everyone's contribution to making it a pleasurable day, even a simple "happy birthday" made me feel special. i was quite surprised.

i found out that i'm going to go to princeton to pick out my car soon, but my dad & cathy are convinced i'm getting a grand am. i don't really mind, i'm just gonna trash it to get on Pimp My Ride anyways..cos that's the real spirit.

it's 1:30 AM and i have muchos assingmentos to do, and another bubble bath to take, annnndddddd laundry to do..so i bid you farewell. i must remember gobstoppers for jake tomorrow..[happy birthday gay man].

a splash of blood across a canvas
paints the portrait of a broken heart
as the shoreline sculpts the outline
of a world torn apart
in letters i write to you
smeared grey with ink and tears
i want you to know that i miss you
but i don't want you here


it's done and over with, but don't get me wrong. no regrets here. not yet. i'm not upset and that upsets me. i plan on taking a break from everyone during summer vacation. i've decided to devote my precious time to my dog. he could use some attention; i could use some luv'n. today is my birthday. happy birthday to me.

this blade in my chest
is making it harder for me to breathe
i gave you the knife, to stab in my back
but you couldn't even do that for me
guess i've learned my lesson
after all these years i've come to see
best friends means stabbing you in the heart
and staying to watch you bleed.

I'm not one to point fingers, but maybe my lack of self-esteem reflects your ways of crushing it every day?. Just a thought.

Tonight I didn't make myself wait, and it felt wonderful.

i'd like to make this as non sentimental as possible. i'm a sucker for bumps in the road. i don't want to hear you tell me that we'll be together forever, and you'll always love me, because you won't. and there's no such thing as forever nowadays. and they say true love always has happy endings. but they're all wrong. true love never has happy endings because true love never ends. and i don't care if this crushes your dreams because i'm honestly sick of the image you have of me in your head. you like thinking i'm perfect, and that i never make mistakes, but you're completely wrong. if you really think that, then you obviously don't know me. and how can you love someone you don't even really know? so when you tell me you love me, i'm compelled to say "don't lie." and i can't help it, i've tried but nothing works. it's in my nature to not believe you.
<center>i love you, but i'm not in love with you

and i don't know how you feel, but i'll make you a deal. if you make it out alive, my shoulders and ears are all yours, my dear. i hope it comes as no surprise. you've been known to say that you're a-okay, when you're feeling sick inside. i just want you to know, i got no place to go..until the day you die.

your bleeding hearts will dry, their sympathy will die.

what the fuck can i say?
Fuck you.

i don't know. i felt relief at the same time as i felt annoyed.  it takes two, baby. i can't seem to figure out what i want anymore, which is entirely discouraging. i have nothing to look forward too, but today was a good day? megan came and stayed for 5 hours. she brought me brownies & took me to tiki for some green river & sunflower seeds. we watched a movie and reminisced. megan takes care of me good. there's so much of nothing to say. feels like my life's decided to do dying. i feel like sucking on chloroform. & fuck 11:11.

today i was reluctant to go to the peru mall, but my mother insisted. she says my clothes are not dressy enough for the banquet i will be hosting (along with my fellow peers) at oglesby washington elementary school on tuesday. she also commented on the fact that i do not remind her of a girl; and when she looks at me, she thinks "man" (as in the gender).  thank you, mother.

`tis also the start of our break from each other.
well, actually...i told him i needed a break. (refer to previous journal entry)
and you know it's not like it's just what happened last night, it happens all the time and i'm just getting sick of it...

i told him that i need a break.
how do i know what i need when i don't even know what i want?

a ride in the car could never have been so destructive.  i was intensely yelled at for wanting to watch the beginning of a movie instead of starting 4 chapters in, but supposedly i took cory's side over his so he had every right to scream. there's two sides of every story..mine: i wanted to watch the movie from the beginning. his: i agreed with cory just to intentionally piss him off; he feels that cory is taking me away from him. when weekend after weekend turns into fight after fight, you have to start thinking: is it really worth it? 


i dont think so anymore.


clever
clever is all
but you're never wrong

so i told him he had little ears, an ugly nose, and a big butt.



i'm pathetically lazy.

tonight was all about sleep. 6 hours after school & i was yelled at for it? but i dont give shit for it cos i'd much rather be in my bed than anywhere else. so i'm practicing my 10-15 minutes of diaphragmatic breathing everyday and it's going over rather well. it makes me dizzy tho because i guess i'm not used to breathing. the right way. ... tonight i fell in love with ignorance. its going to be all right. yeah you worry too much, kid.

i'm a hater.



"man i really gotta lose this bitch in the worst kind of way."



seriously, it gets badd -er.

i waited for you
i died inside my own head
and i'd die again for you.

so who else's weekend sucked horrid ass? things fell apart in a matter of moments but took days to rebuild. sometimes i don't think it's worth it, sometimes i don't know why we're even togther. bloody hell. tomorrow we have to work like crank to get our project to editing standards for 2's day. (th@'s right, tuesday). maybe i should get some rest?

why's it always have to be me
who's always left out to burn
and i'll never learn

today was eww. went to phil's after school & took a nap while phil, cory, bert, & staab played videogames. woke up to wood petting my head and saying "ha-ha look at her, she's sleeping" so that was twisted. came home, slept, did the usual bull shit and now it's 11 & i've succeeded at entirely wasting another day away. but its aight because tacoland gave me free cinnammon things & that's pretty neat-o. my head hurts and i'm tired but you know damn right i won't sleep tonight. the japanese is fading and tomorrow's not looking better. i'm jealous of the musicalists?. i'm tired of being a big fat lazy bum. f'sho. honestly, i never thought i'd be pushed to the side like that. i guess i'm fucking blind.

so its technically thursday morning, but i like considering it wednesday night. fuckin BAD ASS YAH! anyways, so today was early dismissal=not early enough. so we work on our news thing fo historay class. we bought cassette tapes instead of movie cassette things, so we couldnt use cory's camera. we get megan's grampa's and in 3.5 hours we have a dead battery and 2 shots. consisting of me killing aly & me weeping over arnold (megan) dying___but cory recorded over our death scene so we got shit. 30 foot has been destroyed & that just pisses me off. when we went down there to discover happy grassy fields inplaceof suicide cliff, i about cried. fuck you (an ode to the rich man). power to the people. tonight my sister snuck me to phil's house at 9-ish til 10 or so. we went on a walk. `twas romantic. i should be sleeping right now. why am i not sleeping right now.

i lurve you.

just got home from phils. today we watched SPINAL TAP: A ROCKUMENTARY. hence the name, spinal tap is a rock band, and has no relation to the medical procedure. i also watched bird cage with phils parentals and that was good and people are good and that movie examplifies such an act of greatness. but i'm not homophobe like some man we call steven that i know. so shiz tomorrow i have to go to betty boop's farmhouse & i'm not lookin forward to that cos my step mom will be there with my dad. but my cousin might be thurr & i haven't seen him for 3 years so that'd be neat. d00d i watched waynes world 1 & 2 sort-of. to the bubble bath i go & then i'll prolly watch romeo&juliet so peace out crackerz. d00dZ total edit: HAPPY EASTER YO!!

ALI: IN DEEPEST POO EVER.


i'm all out of the bubble bath and up my phone and 8 missed callz from phil and i feel it asshole-like. & the phone's all broken and i'm clean and smelly. tonight major relief came in the crest of my underwear. let's just say there's no bread in the oven and i spilled my kool aid todayz. omg.i updated 5 hours ago, WHO DOES THAT? & it's almost 5 in the mornin' and i can't get peanut butter and jelly off my mind. i made a mix nontape (CD) and i find out he doezn't like yellowcard and i'm not going to see incubus july 13 =(  but im goin to warped and my mother's anchovi ass can eat my socks. on my birthday i'm going to an EAGLES concert. A-fuckin-MEN to 80's hard rock/country muzak. peace on the street bros. keep yur shit clean.


i wake up in 5 hours to phil being all 'where were you last night'
oh snap. oh snap.

what the crap happened to my planz, d00ds? that's it. screw you, spring break which ruined my week. thursdays are the worst but i see a new light. and i don't even need my baka no kareshi anymore. and maybe that's a lie. but i don't need any kareshi anymore at all. because kareshis make everything stupid and dumb and stupid and dumb. and friends are good enough and even better. 'bros before hos' was the old term; now it's 'bros not hos.' i might even exclude the hos part. it would just be BROS. because that's the real spirit. okay i lied kareshis are an okay thing. once again i am restless and i find myself complaining in here, as if i'm magically going to be able to fall asleep having completed yet another pointless journal update. i really have nothing to say, other than the the fact that romeo and juliet is a wonderful movie and has succeeded at making me cry. not many movies have such an empowering effect on me, but what can i say..Mercutio is my favorite and he dies oh so dramatically. i'll be at phil's in about 8 hours, which is a comforting thought. today/tonight was terrible and i think i had morning sickness. omg lolz. whatever. where are you now? cause i'm kissing you..

what a coincidence. media thinks it can solve your problems by the click of a mouse, or the turn of a page..but they're all wrong. reading some man's interpretation of relationships and how to keep them strong is just another 20 bucks in his pocket, and a waste of our time. music is only a temporary solution to block out your problems, and magazines aren't worth the excitement of recieving mail. so what's the perfect solution to your problems? deal with them. how do you deal with them? that's for you to figure out. i'm just here to bitch about those eyes who hide behind the books and magazines, those ears only taking in what headphones have to offer. don't cover up your problems with someone else's 2 cents. posting lyrics isn't gonna help shit. oh yah, and reading sucks.

It's like..I'm trying to hold on and live, and I need you, but you're already dressed for my funeral.

These scars don't mean a thing.
"Yes they do."
NO, they don't.
"Are you running from your past?"
I'm not running...
"Then what are you doing?"
...I just can't go back.

It's not about winning. Every breath I take is a relief, every feeling i trick myself into only ends up hurting me in the end. Sometimes you have to think, Is it really worth it? It scares me, I don't think I'll ever know the answer. I don't think I'll ever have you figured out, but you..You know everything to say and do to get me. And I hate it. I don't know how you have such control over me, and I could never figure it out. You are so conning, you persuade me to think that you really are in love, then reality sets in and I can't help to wonder if the feelings you are trying to portray are really true. You have a way with words like no other, and sometimes, I don't know the meaning behind what you're saying. Is it honestly worth the pain we create for each other? You're so wrapped up in having this perfect image of me in your head, that you can't see the real me. The truth is..I used to be so afraid of losing you that I would hold back, for fear you might lose interest. Lately it's been just the opposite, and I find myself saying things that I never thought I would. I act like I don't care, but I swear I do. I'm pretty sure I do. I just wish I could say I was happy. I wish I could pretend, like you. You're so good at pretending everything's okay. I wish i had that capability..
the only reason you don't have answers is because you've been too scared to ask yourself the right questions.
